title: Hi-Tech Pipes aims 13.5 MW solar capacity for captive usage by December 2024
description: Hi-Tech Pipes aims to have 13.5 MW of renewable energy capacity for captive usage by December 2024, with an installed solar power capacity of 8.5 MW and plans to install another 5 MW gradually. The company's green power sourcing will contribute around 30% of its total power requirement. Additionally, Hi-Tech Pipes has signed an MoU with a renewable energy supplier for green hydrogen projects and operates six manufacturing facilities across India.
